comment.author: 42056688@N06
comment._content: How sad, to be so young and not taste life ;- (

comment.author: 29149530@N06
comment._content: Wow!  I would never thought I would see a dead baby in a casket displayed like that. I'm woundering what the purpose of this photograph is? And another thought, would we today ever let someone take a photo like this, outside a criminal investigation.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content: I debated about putting this photo up, but it is part of the photographer's work and there are other similar photos up on the Commons, so I went ahead with it. Apparently, it was quite common back in those days to take photos like this. Quite sad though.
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos

comment.author: 11636182@N07
comment._content: Sad, yes.  Death is also a part of life.
